      • copy

        public static DigitalObject copy(DigitalObject dobj,
                                 Repository repo,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> elementsToInclude,
                                 boolean copyAll)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 RepositoryException,
                                 CreationException
        Copies the digital object and the specified data elements. Network intensive.
        Parameters:
        dobj - Digital object to be copied.
        repo - Destination Repository.
        elementsToInclude - list of the element names to be included in the copy.
        copyAll - If set to true all elements will be copied.
        Returns:
        A reference to the DigitalObject in the destination repository.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        RepositoryException
        CreationException
